segments.text: How's it going, babe?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: All right.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Good.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Hey listen,eh- I've been wanting to talk to you. I have something to tell you. How's Amy doing?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: She's doing fine. She just took her first steps today actually. I videotaped it for you so you can watch it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: oh.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I really want to say that. Well I, so, you know, at the center department they called me in and I talked to-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh, yeah? What did they say?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well umm- actually they--I was promoted.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh, wow. That's great.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And Uh- Yeah. Uh- They're going to need um- more nurses on call for uh- to go overseas to help out with the war.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: And uh - seeing as I was uh- promoted and head of the department now, and so- well, they asked me to go.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: when?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's going- It's going to be probably in about three weeks.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What? You can't do that. Three weeks?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: yeah
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well, I'm leaving in three weeks, but-- Yeah.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: God, we're supposed to take a look at a house next week.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Maybe we can still do that
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I can't- No, I can't do this alone.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, and uh--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Amy's starting school in a month.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I know, but look, I have to take this. I mean, if I don't, I mean, I could get fired.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: And we know you need-we need the money. We couldn't even- purchase a house if I didn't take this.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: God.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You know what happened to my cousin. She went and she never came back.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Honey, I'm going to come back. It's not like that.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: But it- it is for a year.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Oh
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Babe, I'm sorry. But I don't want to do.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I can't-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You know as much as -as much as me that I-I want to stay here with you and Amy so bad, but I can't.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You remember the last time you went? You know how hard it was for me? Now we have a kid.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: But you're so good with her. You know, she knows you better than she knows me 'cause I'm at work every day.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I have to work.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: [BREATHING]
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Babe, I love you.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You can't leave your daughter alone like this.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: But she has you. I mean, that's what you're there for. You're my right-hand man.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's going to be okay.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: You can't postpone it?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No, I have to go.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Wait, you can write me and as you know, send me pictures.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't know if I can handle you going another year.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: What do you mean?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't know if I- if I could take it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Look, I need you to be strong for me. 'Cause I can't be the only one that's strong right now, really, I--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I can't be that strong. A whole year.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: me, oh my god.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: But we can work, you know, we--you can write me and we could see pictures
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What if you don't come back?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and if we survive, if we survive that then babe, you know you know we could survive any--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I will come back.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What am I supposed--oh, one out of five people aren't coming back.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It doesn't look very good.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I can do it. I'm going to do it. And I'll be back safe and sound and-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: we'll have all the money that we ever needed.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: And- And then I'll stop working and- I'll stay home with the baby.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't want the money. I want-you here
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: we'll get money, all right? You don't need the job, all right?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: If your life is going to be in danger and this family is going to be in danger we don't need the job. We'll find the money.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's all I ever knew how to do. I can't quit now.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: How are we supposed to tell Amy? How's she supposed to understand that?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well, we- we tell her mommy's going on va- on a trip for for- a while.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: How is she going to feel the first year in school, no mom.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Don't do that to me.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's hard enough already, Brian, I can't.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm not thinking about just me; I'm thinking about our child.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I didn't expect this to happen. I never planned for this. Some things you just don't plan for, you know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm sorry, babe.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm so sorry.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: All right, then.
segments.speaker: M
